attributes.description: The following source-map is a visual and written representation of the manufacturing and distribution network of Coca Cola. Beginning with basic ingredient accumulation to product distribution, this map will provide a simplistic overview of the Coca Cola distribution network. Due to the shear size of the Coca Cola Industries, this source map will only provide a general outline of the Coca Cola distribution system acquired through research. The actual network is significantly more active and prosperous world-wide.
attributes.title: International Manufacturing and Distribution of Coca Cola
Water & Concentrate Distribution Locations (Typically municipal or provincial)
attributes.description: Coca Cola Industries typically does not import water world-wide, but instead utilizes local or provincial sources of water treatment. Water Distribution Center locations are not specified due to the number  of distributors and lack of resources concerning such addresses.

attributes.title: Coca Cola Hellenic Bottling Company
attributes.description: With their primary headquarters located in Athens, Coca Cola Hellenic Bottling Company distributes to 28 countries world-wide. Known to be one of the world's largest Coca Cola bottling company, Coca Cola Hellenic distributes as far as Ireland and the easternmost point of Eurasia; as seen in the source-map.

attributes.title: Coca Cola Hellenic Receiving Location
attributes.description: Receiving, storing and further distributing locations for Coca Cola. This pinpoint indicates general regions of transportation instead of specific address due to the vast number of locations. Coca Cola is distributed to sales and marketing industries or equipment, which is then purchased and enjoyed by consumers.

attributes.title: Coca Cola FEMSA Bottling Company
attributes.description: Coca Cola FEMSA Bottling Company has been recorded as the world's most successful Coca Cola bottling service in terms of sales and profit. Distributing all across Latin America including; Brazil, Mexico, Columbia and Panama, Coca Cola FEMSA Bottling Company distributes to approximately 1,600,000 retailers in the region.

attributes.title: Coca Cola FEMSA Receiving Location
attributes.description: Coca Cole FEMSA distributes to approximately 1,600,000 retailers in the region, supply all of central and south America. Coca Cola beverages are distributed to various stores, restaurants and other sales and marketing facilities or equipment. Coca Cola FEMSA is believed to make approximately 2.5 billion unit cases per year.

attributes.title: Coca Cola Amatil Bottling Company
Coca Cola Amatil Distributing Locations
attributes.description: Coca Cola Amatil distributes to over 700,00 active customers including sales and marketing facilities and equipment. Supplying to over 5 countries including; New Zealand, Australia, Fiji, Indonesia and Papua New Guinea. Due to the shear number of distributing locations and marketing facilities, general regions are indicated as opposed to exact locations
